title: Fix perception task tutorial to reflect final submission protocol

content.raw:
The current version of the [perception task tutorial](#!/osrf/vrx/wiki/tutorials/vrx_tasks_2019#markdown-header-3-perception) gives the following command for publishing landmark identification and localization solutions to the `/vrx/perception/landmark` topic:

```
rostopic pub -r 1 /vrx/perception/landmark geographic_msgs/GeoPoseStamped '{header: {stamp: now, frame_id: "red_mark"}, pose: {position: {latitude: 21.30996, longitude: -157.8901, altitude: 0.0}}}'
```

This command causes the submission to be published repeatedly at 1Hz, and must be canceled manually with CTRL\+C. It seems likely that this command should instead be:

```
rostopic pub -1 /vrx/perception/landmark geographic_msgs/GeoPoseStamped '{header: {stamp: now, frame_id: "red_mark"}, pose: {position: {latitude: 21.30996, longitude: -157.8901, altitude: 0.0}}}'
```

which publishes the solution once and latches it for 3 seconds. 

However, it would be good to specify whether this publication must occur while the object is still in view, so this fix depends on issue #117.
